body: Explore This Park    Learn About the Park     Photos & Multimedia             Photos & Multimedia                Interested in exploring César E. Chávez National Monument from home? Use our new virtual tour to see the visitor center, memorial garden, and grave site, and the rest of the La Paz site. Follow the tour's suggested path, or choose your own path by selecting sites from the map. As you move through the panoramic photos in the virtual tour, use your mouse to rotate your view.                     César E. Chávez National Monument   5 Photos  Photos of the monument's exhibit hall, memorial garden, and outdoor paths.
title: César E. Chávez National Monument: Photos & Multimedia
